loc2.description: You find secret lore hidden in the mosaics on the wall. Make a Lore (+2) check and gain Clue tokens equal to your successes
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: The conical entity tries to teach you some magic. Pass a Lore (-2) [2] check to draw 2 Spells.
loc1.name: City of the Great Race

other.description: You find some valuable items that you can sell back in Arkham. Gain $3
